resources.string:
Baseball is a guessing game. 
 
 How to Play >> 
 
 Guess any four-digit numbers! 
 ** EACH DIGIT MUST HAVE DIFFERENT NUMBERS ** 
 
 Strike (S) 
 You get a strike or strikes, if any three of your input has the same number and same digit as the answer. 
 
 Ball (B) 
 You get a ball or balls, if any three of your input has the same number but different digit as the answer. 
 
 Out (Out) 
 You get out, if none of your input is in the answer.
